name: (R) Ref. Case Elec. Boiler FS (NG Boiler)
_description: Minimum efficiency electric oiler heating with existing cooling, fuel switching from gas boiler.

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Typical value for performance, converted to Scout units where necessary.

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Administration

installed_cost_source.notes: Typical efficiency costs in 2023 for commercial electric boiler unit and paired cooling.
installed_cost_source.source_data: Buildings Annual Technology Baseline. NREL, forthcoming

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Administration

market_scaling_fractions_source.notes: Heating multiples were determined as proportion of total homes with gas heating that have both cooling and heating systems in each BA climate zone. Cooling multiple of 5% was determined as a proportion of total homes with a cooling system (16,171 homes) where there is heating via natural gas steam/hot water (779 homes).
